name: Bomb VS. Beast: Rap Battle
description:
What started as a friendly rivalry has turned nasty.

It's Bomb VS. Beast in an epic rap showdown between bi-coastal offices of internet videogaming personalities.

Player 1 will control a member of Giant Bomb, while Player 2 represents Giant Beast. Choose your rapper and prepare to throw down! With words, not fists.

Sometimes words can hurt as much as fists.

game: Adam Tool (@adamtool)

music: GL Beats (@ugli_i_records)

made between November 27th and December 7th in the Year of the Sheep (2015) for Giant ROM 2: The Giant Bomb Game Jam
